add_jplm_test(CppIterTools cppitertools_tests CppIterToolsTests.cpp "gtest_main")
add_jplm_test(JSON json_tests NlohmannJSONTests.cpp "gtest_main")
add_jplm_test(CxxProperties cxx_properties_tests CXXPropertiesTests.cpp "gtest_main")
add_jplm_test(Magic_enum magic_enum_tests Magic_EnumTests.cpp "gtest_main")
